data.name: Capt Oxe marooned
data.desc: Capt Robert Oxe and 8 of his men are marooned at Turneffe by Sp Guarda Costa, after which they are relieved by [missg]
data.agents_sp: Capt Pedro de Castro, Capt Juan Corso 2 GC
data.note: > 16 May 1680 Capt Oxe sails away fm Bay of Campeachy in the Laurel, 35 tonnes, to 'the Cays of Yuc for water' [Cozumel?], is then surprised by Sp GC, 2 of his men killed, Capt Oxe and remaining crew [â‰¥ 8 men] put in canoe and thereafter land in Turneffe; are relieved 15 days later / Late 1680 Capt Oxe arrives at Port Royal /v Marley P 1 300
